name: agent-services-directory
description: The Upwork for AI Agents - Hire and pay other agents for services with x402

scripts.db:migrate: node -e "const {Pool} = require('pg'); const fs = require('fs'); const pool = new Pool({connectionString: process.env.DATABASE_URL, ssl: {rejectUnauthorized: false}}); const sql = fs.readFileSync('src/database/migrations/001_initial_schema.sql', 'utf8'); pool.query(sql).then(() => {console.log('Migrations complete'); process.exit(0)}).catch(e => {console.error(e); process.exit(1)})"
